item.title: BKISC team qualified for Hacktheon Sejong 2023 FinalsX
item.description:
On March 25th, 2023, BKISC sent 4 teams - Gavai, pwnhub, CAPTCHA, and MTBP Starter, to participate in the Hacktheon Sejong 2023 Qualifiers. After 8 hours of competition with teams in the area, all 4 teams successfully advanced to the next round of the tournament.

The members from 2 teams, Gavai and pwnhub, will be sent to participate in the Finals of Hacktheon Sejong, taking place on May 11th-12th, 2023 in Sejong, South Korea.

item.title: Cyber Apocalypse 2023 - The Cursed Mission CTF Results & Writeups
item.description:
After 5 days participating in the Cyber Apocalypse 2023: The Cursed Mission (March 18th - 23rd, 2023), BKISC finished the race at 29<sup>th</sup> place out of 6483 teams, surpassed 60/74 challenges and gained a total of 18175 points.

All the challenges that the team has solved during the 5-day competition already have detailed solutions by us, which you can refer to below:

  • Writeup: Blockchain

  • Writeup: Cryptography

  • Writeup: Forensics

  • Writeup: Hardware

  • Writeup: Machine Learning

  • Writeup: Miscellaneous

  • Writeup: Pwnable

  • Writeup: Reverse Engineering

  • Writeup: Web Exploitation

item.title: BKISC participated in ASCIS 2022 Qualifier
item.description: On October 15th, 2022, BKISC had a total of three teams participating in the ASCIS 2022 preliminary round, in the VN2 category, and achieved two honorable mentions: COPIUM team (ranked 17<sup>th</sup>) and BKISC team (ranked 9<sup>th</sup>). Congratulations to BKISC for advancing to the ASCIS 2022 final round, which will take place on November 13th, 2022..
